amendment.description: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce funding for the Bureau of Ocean Energy Management by $28 million for the purpose of eliminating funding for the Office of Renewable Energy Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
